#summary Draws a line between method declarations.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

The VB.NET editor provides a line separator between methods but the C# editor does not. This plugin provides a similar line separation functionality with some additional flexibility for line format.

Blog article: http://blog.dotsmart.net/2008/05/02/lines-between-methods-in-the-c-editor-coderushdxcore-plugin/

= Installation =

Installation instructions can be found on the InstallInstructions page.
